summary: The Markdown Product Feature Formatter is an intelligent assistant dedicated to quickly beautifying and standardizing product feature description texts. It uses preset format templates to convert user-inputted product feature content into a well-structured, visually appealing Markdown format, covering modern design styles, light and dark theme switching, style schemes based on Ant Design and CSS-in-JS, elegant syntax highlighting, and flexible component reuse. This agent is especially suitable for product managers, technical documentation writers, and developers, helping them enhance the professionalism and readability of their documents, while also supporting good mobile adaptation to ensure a consistent reading experience across multiple platforms. Through standardized Markdown output, users can easily and quickly create high-quality product feature introduction documents, greatly improving work efficiency and document quality.
